text: Sano pati gaawunichile ŵanganyao matumbela ganti chisawu miulili (ja mawunde gawula ni matumbi), akasam’bombaga Allah mwakunswejechesya duwa (syao pakum’bomba Jwele pejo), nambo nkwakulupuchisya pankuuli, basi ŵane mwa jamanjao pana ŵaakuŵa chilikati (cha chikulupi ni ukafili). Ni pangali ŵaakasaikanilaga imanyilo Yetu ikaŵeje nkukasa nnope ilanga jwalijose, jwakufulu nnope
